database.name: VIEW EFIN_ACCOUNT_CHAPTER_REPORT
database.view: SELECT c_elementvalue.c_elementvalue_id, c_elementvalue.ad_client_id, c_elementvalue.ad_org_id, c_elementvalue.isactive, c_elementvalue.created, c_elementvalue.createdby, c_elementvalue.updated, c_elementvalue.updatedby, c_elementvalue.value, c_elementvalue.name, c_elementvalue.description, c_elementvalue.accounttype, c_elementvalue.accountsign, c_elementvalue.isdoccontrolled, c_elementvalue.c_element_id, c_elementvalue.issummary, c_elementvalue.validfrom, c_elementvalue.validto, c_elementvalue.postactual, c_elementvalue.postbudget, c_elementvalue.postencumbrance, c_elementvalue.poststatistical, c_elementvalue.isbankaccount, c_elementvalue.c_bankaccount_id, c_elementvalue.isforeigncurrency, c_elementvalue.c_currency_id, c_elementvalue.showelement, c_elementvalue.showvaluecond, c_elementvalue.elementlevel, c_elementvalue.isalwaysshown, c_elementvalue.em_efin_allow_budgeting, c_elementvalue.em_efin_mof_account, c_elementvalue.em_efin_project_id, c_elementvalue.em_efin_projacct, c_elementvalue.em_efin_linkorg, c_elementvalue.em_efin_createacccomb, c_elementvalue.em_efin_linkproject, c_elementvalue.em_efin_isdeptfund, c_elementvalue.em_efin_imp_parent, c_elementvalue.em_efin_status, c_elementvalue.em_efin_c_year_id, c_elementvalue.em_efin_fundsonly FROM c_elementvalue WHERE c_elementvalue.value LIKE '21%' OR c_elementvalue.value LIKE '22%' OR c_elementvalue.value LIKE '23%' OR c_elementvalue.value LIKE '24%' OR c_elementvalue.value LIKE '25%' OR c_elementvalue.value LIKE '26%' OR c_elementvalue.value LIKE '27%' OR c_elementvalue.value LIKE '28%' OR c_elementvalue.value LIKE '3%' OR c_elementvalue.value LIKE '4%'
